title: Parking Meter Attendant Pleads Guilty To Pocketing Quarters
teaser: Marc Corsmeier admitted to keeping $50 a week in quarters for himself. After 8 years, that totaled to about $20,000. A store owner tipped police off, according to The Cincinnati Enquirer.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
